org.accada.reader.rp.client
Class TestClient

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      org.accada.reader.rp.client.TestClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, Client
public class TestClient
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements Client

This is a test client which can be used to test an implementation of the reader protocol. Command can be created by using an interactive user interface, the command is generated into the appropriate message format. In this version only the XML format is supported. Because I didn't focus on this client in my semester thesis the code quality of this client might be not optimal :-)

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
See Also:
Serialized Form
